original_title: Cap'n O.G. Readmore Meets Red Riding Hood
overview: Cap'n O.G. Readmore and his friends are holding their Friday Night Book Club meeting. Cap'n O.G. makes the mistake of underestimating the value of a good villain and ends up meeting Little Red Riding Hood as the new Big Bad Wolf.
title: Cap'n O.G. Readmore Meets Red Riding Hood
